pkgmetadata.longdescription: The Kernel Method of Test Equating // Implements the kernel method of test equating as defined in von Davier, A. A., Holland, P. W. and Thayer, D. T. (2004) doi: 10.1007/b97446 and Andersson, B. and Wiberg, M. (2017) doi: 10.1007/s11336-016-9528-7 using the CB, EG, SG, NEAT CE/PSE and NEC designs, supporting Gaussian, logistic and uniform kernels and unsmoothed and pre-smoothed input data.
